availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Keith Berry (Mason County, Kentucky, circuit clerk)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, court clerk. Mason County native. Son of Darius Berry and Eliza Keith Berry. Married to Georgia Ann Berry in Mason County, Kentucky, on November 14, 1857. Father of Eliza Berry. Clerk of Mason Circuit Court in Mason County from 1860 to 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, Ward 3, p. 84.
